name: disable-8dot3-lastaccess
title: Disable 8dot3 Filenames and Last Access Time
description: Disables 8dot3 name creation and last access time updates for performance improvements.
deepDescription: Disables creation of legacy 8.3 format filenames on the C: drive and globally. Strips existing 8dot3 names from C:. Disables last access time updates to improve performance. Note: stripping 8dot3 names is irreversible.
warning: Stripping 8dot3 filenames on C: is irreversible. Ensure no legacy applications depend on them.
